title: The 2021 NBA Finals Is the Chris Paul Legacy Series | Real Ones
description:
Logan and Raja discuss the Suns beating the Bucks in Game 1 of the NBA Finals (0:42), then go through The Ringer’s 2021 NBA Finals Entrance Survey and respond to all the questions (23:03).
Hosts: Logan Murdock and Raja Bell
Associate Producer: Sasha Ashall
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
